RelatedSentence: The 90 - minute walking tours take visitors through four laboratories at Horn Point at 10 a.m. every Tuesday and Saturday through the end of August .
Visitors will tour the largest oyster hatchery on the East coast and see restoration efforts for Atlantic sturgeon , a once abundant fish in the Bay .
